componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Determine if this opportunity was submitted for approval - Scroll to Approval History and click View All.

If the approval status is "Submitted" and it is not "Approved" then it means your record is not approved and locked from edits. The person who submitted for approval must recall the approval request before making edits.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: 📢 The related Account is missing Type or its value is outdated and requires update

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10
